plot: In this personal documentary, filmmaker Sean Grasso returns to his home Las Vegas, Nevada to interview his family. The city serves as the backdrop in this meditation on life, interests, and the roles we choose.
title: So Far So Good
plot_es: In this personal documentary, filmmaker Sean Grasso returns to his home Las Vegas, Nevada to interview his family. The city serves as the backdrop in this meditation on life, interests, and the roles we choose.
plot_en: In this personal documentary, filmmaker Sean Grasso returns to his home Las Vegas, Nevada to interview his family. The city serves as the backdrop in this meditation on life, interests, and the roles we choose.
